text:
Company: Morris, Thompson and Wright

Job Title: Lead Security Program Manager, Security Engineering, Microsoft Trustworthy Computing

About Us:
Morris, Thompson and Wright is a leading technology consulting firm dedicated to delivering innovative solutions to our clients. We are committed to fostering a culture of openness, inclusivity, and respect for all individuals.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Lead Security Program Manager to join our Security Engineering team. As a Lead Security Program Manager, you will be responsible for managing and implementing comprehensive security programs to protect our clients' sensitive data and systems.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain security programs aligned with industry standards and best practices
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and mitigate security risks
- Provide guidance and oversight to ensure compliance with security policies and procedures
- Support the development of security awareness training programs for employees
- Stay up-to-date with emerging security trends and threats, and recommend proactive measures to address them

Qualifications:
- 8+ years of experience in security program management, preferably in a cloud-based environment
- Strong knowledge of security frameworks, regulations, and industry standards (e.g., NIST, ISO 27001)
- Excellent communication, leadership, and project management skills
- Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Assurance, or a related field

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible work arrangements, including remote work options
